name: No Time To Shine
description:
DILEMMA OF A CANDLE: HAVE you ever thought about how HARD life must be for a candle? For its entire life, we—candles—lie in the darkness of your old toolbox, waiting for a SINGLE MOMENT for which we were born — to light up and quickly burn down. Sounds depressing? But not all candles are ready to accept this horrific fate, at least I'm NOT! You can call me Shine and I'm a candle. Please, help me to find the escape from this meaningless routine. However, BE SMART to not dull my shine for nothing — the time is limited when a candle lights up, you know! I don't want to repeat the fate of my grandcandle... TO SAVE MY LIFE: • MOVE the platforms with my light!         • FIND the quickest and shortest path for an Escape!  • SHIFT between the dark frozen mode and shining "OMG TIME RUNS DOWN FAST" mode         • EXPERIMENT with different routes (a lot of experiments) • and MOST IMPORTANTLY: AVOID the black hole at any cost, I BEG YOU IMPORTANT MESSAGE:

 For the BEST performance (especially for MAC users), try to download the application files (Windows x64/MAC)  in the bottom of the page. Version for a Web Browser might be slower, thank you for understanding! ;)

P.s. Additionally, I can't make the external hyperlinks to work properly in a browser

P.S.S. NOTE from a creator AtymTima Games™: It's my first Indie Game made in Unity after 1 month of learning and 1 month of development. The "No Time To Shine" is made for a Game Dev TV Community Jam, so it might be updated/remade in the future! It means that any feedback from you might be crucial for me to improve and provide a better game for you next time :)
You can comment on music, art, sound design, level design, or the game itself, which were my first attempt to create something for a game CONTROL BUTTONS: 1. Move to Left/Right (recommended) — "A" and "D" keys NOTE: Move to Left/Right (additional) — arrow keys 2. Short Jump — press SPACE key 3. Higher Jump - hold SPACE key 4. "Shine" (turn ON/OFF the light and time) — "W" key 5. Restart the level — "X" key  6. Quit the game —"U" key SUPPORT AND FEEDBACK:

In case you have any questions/criticism/feedback about the game, Shine will highly appreciate your comments that will help AtymTima Games™ to grow and provide better content for you in the future! To do that:

1. Leave a comment on the itch.io webpage of this game

2. Subscribe to my Game Development channel and write a comment under one of my videos! Our community is a lot of fun! (0 subs now but it will be bigger!)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOC6KNeqE7RAaU0kp_Z157w?sub_confirmation=1

3. Send your comment directly to this email: atymtima.games@gmail.com
